feed.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin wiki is down

entry.title: Combined summary - Bitcoin wiki is down
entry.summary: On March 8, 2014, Tom Geller raised concern about the Bitcoin wiki being down and inquired about a communication procedure or point person for such occurrences. However, it was later revealed that the wiki was undergoing changes in control and operation. It is currently unclear what caused the outage or when it will be resolved. The message from the official source implied that there was no need to worry as a result of the change.There are no known communication procedures or designated point persons for reporting issues with the Bitcoin wiki. In case of any assistance needed with articles, marketing, videos, user guides, and books related to Bitcoin, Tom Geller, a writer and presenter based in Oberlin, Ohio, can be reached through his contact information available on his website, http://www.tomgeller.com.
